questions.question_text: What are the three most common materials used for water distribution piping?

options.A: Colour coded blue, available in coils or rigid lengths = Type L Copper
options.B: Series 80, 100, 125, 160, 200 â€“ may be used for cold water only = PVC
options.C: (Polypropylene) may be used for hot and cold-water distribution = PP-R
options.D: (Chlorinated) may be used for hot and cold-water distribution = CPVC
